Name: Venkazoid Blast
About the game: Venkazoid Blast is an arcade-style fixed shooter. As Vakimoh, you’ll blast your way through many bite-sized rounds against the fearsome Venkazoids. If you get hit, you die. If you lose all of your lives, it’s back to round one! How long can you survive? They don't think it will be for very long...
